about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Federation rank 15 sabotage interceptor “Peregrine”
  • Active module Electronic interference dispenser
  • Special title “Biomechanic” — for being able to effectively operate a bionic computer and use the full capabilities of an organic neural network.
  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.
  • Special missiles “Magnetic mine” — 30 pcs.
  • Portrait “Hideo”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

An extraordinary and mysterious ship “Peregrine” is waiting for its owner! A certain philanthropist ordered the development of this interceptor specifically for you, using all the most advanced technologies of the Federation. The bionic brain and organic neural network that replace the wiring allow “Peregrine” to be flexible and precise in combat, outperforming other models in its class. However, Peregrine is not just another ship, it is truly unique, capable of understanding and adapting to its pilot. This is a ship that will not only get the job done, but that will do it with unsurpassed efficiency and style. Your mission is to take control of “Peregrine” and perform legendary feats in battles against aliens!

name: Star Conflict - Peregrine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includes:Federation rank 15 sabotage interceptor “Peregrine”Active module Electronic interference dispenserSpecial title “Biomechanic” — for being able to effectively operate a bionic computer and use the full capabilities of an organic neural network.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
